func Handler() func(ctx *fiber.Ctx) error

## type Index

```go
type Index string
```

```go
const (
    RootIndex   Index = "/api"
    ArmiesIndex       = "/api/armies"
)
```

### func \(Index\) List

```go
func (i Index) List() []string
```

List lists out the the available API routes

### func \(\*Index\) Reply
